author: burton
msg: added support for a Java Runtime control panel.  Very basic and just gives the system properties and also the memory info

author: burton
msg: completion of the Admin console.  You are now able to dock admin Portlets into Jetspeed and view them from a screen

author: burton
msg: new method in Portlet to determine if it should be edit or maximized
the DefaultPortletControl now pays attention to this

author: burton
msg: Admin interface for the most part works.  Need to be smarter about multiple portlets
